'''1.21.71''' is a hotfix for ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on March 28, 2025 on most platforms and March 31, 2025 for Fire tablets and Nintendo Switch, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/35325099799821-Minecraft-1-21-71-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.71 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=March 28, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.71
|;prev
|191525|Entity death animation plays too fast compared to previous versions.
|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed an issue that prevented buttons for external links from working correctly on iOS and iPadOS devices.
* Fixed client and server desynchronizing on entities the client erroneously thought were dead.
